OOC: Oh, and guys, I'm assuming we get one post with Abominus before going =
on to the next person's turn, so if I'm right, rAuq posts with Abominus nex=
t?
::Abominus/Surgital::

     Abominus was hit in the side by two missiles=
, then turned and was hit in the left side of his chest by plasma blasts.  =
Abominus growled, then fired 1 blast from his gun at Galaxor, then 1 at Gro=
ove and 1 at Scattershot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     =
Surgital stepped back away from Lavatron.  He was getting mad.  Surgital "a=
imed" his elbow at Lavatron, then, the arm being Explobody, fired a grenade=
 from his elbow.
